ygData.subject: Re: Slam vs. Bash
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes maybe he was 28 by then.  His names Mack on MM.  I know a 30th level Ranger with over 3500pp in the bank.  Some people find it easy to make money, I am not
ygData.messageBody:
Yes maybe he was 28 by then. His names Mack on MM. I know a 30th level
Ranger with over 3500pp in the bank. Some people find it easy to make
money, I am not one of those people :)

I got a lucky loot in Unrest last Friday night. Was with a level 25 party,
I was level 19 at the time. I was with them because I knew the leader. I
was hoping to score some bronze gauntlets since I knew someone who wanted to
buy them for 30pp. We managed to pull the Skeleton knight, after a long and
arduous battle we won (barely), it was my loot he had the bloodstained
tunic. I thought wow scored something maybe worth 40pp. Being a novice in
the area, and not wanting it I asked how much was it worth - 250pp!!! A
team member bought it off me, a level 24 paladin.

Even when he gave me the money and I gave him the tunic I said "are you SURE
its worth that much??" he said yes. Off he went, both of us happy.

Now the most money I have EVER had is 100pp. I used all that money buying
my banded armour second hand and 1 combine. Never had I seen so much money
in my characters life.
